forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly clear, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
Today in Downtown San Francisco, the air is crisp and invigorating, an invitation to step outside and embrace the lightly swirling breezes. With a high around 66 degrees, the day promises mostly sunny skies, though the afternoon will see temperatures gently dipping toward the lower 60s. A west-southwest wind, brisk and refreshing, will flutter through the streets, reminding you of the city's coastal embrace. As the sun begins its descent, there might be a slight chance of drizzle creeping in after 2 a.m., but for now, the evening beckons with a clear expanse peppered with the last golden glimmers of daylight.

Despite the allure of clear sunshine, one can still sense the tendrils of fog lurking just beyond the hills, the marine layer waiting patiently to cloak the city in its gray embrace later this night. The view may be spectacular, yet one must acknowledge that San Francisco often finds itself hugging the edges of misty uncertainty. Dress comfortably, perhaps layered, to adjust to the day's changing demeanor—an ode to both warmth and coolness. Then, as the evening unwinds, you might find pleasure in a gentle stroll along the waterfront, savoring the fading light, or perhaps settle by a cozy café with a good book, letting the world melt away as twilight drapes its soft cloak around the city.
